name: full-stack-template
description: Full-stack template with NestJS backend and React frontend

scripts.build: pnpm install && pnpm shared:install && pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && pnpm install && docker-compose build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && pnpm install && docker-compose build
scripts.up: npm run up:backend && npm run up:frontend
scripts.down: npm run down:backend && npm run down:frontend
scripts.restart: npm run restart:backend && npm run restart:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && docker-compose down -v && docker rmi backend-app:latest || true
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && docker-compose down -v && docker rmi frontend-app:latest || true
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run up
scripts.d:install:backend: cd backend && docker-compose exec app pnpm install
scripts.d:install:frontend: cd frontend && docker-compose exec app pnpm install
scripts.d:install-force:backend: cd backend && docker-compose exec app pnpm install --force
scripts.d:install-force:frontend: cd frontend && docker-compose exec app pnpm install --force
scripts.d:cache-clear:backend: cd backend && docker-compose exec app pnpm store prune
scripts.d:cache-clear:frontend: cd frontend && docker-compose exec app pnpm store prune
scripts.d:rebuild:backend: cd backend && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.d:rebuild:frontend: cd frontend && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.d:rebuild: npm run d:rebuild:backend && npm run d:rebuild:frontend
